A '''bamboo''' is a [[feature]] that consist of [[bamboo]] blocks, found throughout [[jungle]] biomes.

== Generation ==
Bamboo features are made of [[bamboo]] blocks. They can be found in [[jungle]]s and much more commonly in [[bamboo jungle]]s.

If the feature generates in a bamboo jungle, then there is a chance for a [[podzol]] disk to generate under the bamboo stalk. This is one of few places podzol naturally appears outside of [[old growth taiga|old growth taigas]] and [[trial chambers]]. In bamboo jungles, overlapping podzol disks of various sizes will cover almost all of the biome's surface.

The height of the bamboo stalk varies between 5 and 16 blocks, but if there is an obstacle blocking it then it will be cut short.

=== Config ===

{{main|Configured feature}}
{{el|java}}:
<section begin="config"/><div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|config}}
** {{nbt|float|probability}} The probability for a podzol disk to generate below the bamboo. The disk has a radius of 1 to 4 blocks. Value between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive).
</div><section end="config"/>

{{Collapse|title=An example|outerstyle=margin: 0.5rem 0|head=1}}
<syntaxhighlight lang="json">
{
  "type": "minecraft:bamboo",
  "config": {
    "probability": 0.2
  }
}
</syntaxhighlight>
{{Collapse|tail=1}}
